TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed HttpClientProvider extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Function HttpClientProvider() As HttpClient
type HttpClientProvider = delegate of unit -> HttpClient

Docs.summary: A delegate that returns an HttpClient that will be used to retrieve a JWK Set while resolving a PoP key from a 'jku' claim.
Docs.returns: An HttpClient used to retrieve a JWK Set.
